nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
nodes.name: ERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title Standard ERC20 token
 * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
Based on code by FirstBlood: https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol
nodes.name: StandardToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Total number of tokens in existence
nodes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
allowance
transfer
approve
transferFrom
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
SafeERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overridden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate
behavior.
nodes.name: Crowdsale
TokenPurchase

nodes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
nodes.name: buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
nodes.name: _forwardFunds

nodes.documentation:
@title AllowanceCrowdsale
@dev Extension of Crowdsale where tokens are held by a wallet, which approves an allowance to the crowdsale.
nodes.name: AllowanceCrowdsale

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor, takes token wallet address.
@param _tokenWallet Address holding the tokens, which has approved allowance to the crowdsale

@dev Checks the amount of tokens left in the allowance.
@return Amount of tokens left in the allowance
nodes.name: remainingTokens
_deliverTokens
